price: ߊ߬ ߟߊߛߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߘߋ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ߤߌ߬ߣߊ߬ߟߊ ߓߟߏ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߒߠߋ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߝߟߐ ߘߌ߫ ( ߘߋ߲ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ )
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul in kāna lilrraḥmāni waladun fa-anā awwalu al-ʿābidīna
